definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.chinese: 老百姓都称其为“骨架电话机”。

sentences.english: This telephone with an inductor call became the company’s trademark.
sentences.chinese: 这部配备感应器的电话机成了该公司的招牌产品。

sentences.english: With the telegraphone, perfect synchronisation is possible.
sentences.chinese: 随着录音电话机的出现，完全同步成为可能。

sentences.english: Butt sets used to be essentially telephones without ringers.
sentences.chinese: 对接装置主要应用于没有振铃器的电话机。

sentences.english: No, I don't need your number: she's prob'ly waitin' by the 'phone.
sentences.chinese: 不，你不必给我电话，或许她正守在电话机旁。

sentences.english: The next day in the yard, an inmate huddles close to the phone.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，在院子里，一个囚犯低着头在电话机旁边。

sentences.english: There were two telephones perched on a roll-top desk in a corner of the room.
sentences.chinese: 传达室一角的拉盖办公桌上放着两部电话机。

sentences.english: Swanson reached for the radio again.
sentences.chinese: 斯旺森再次伸手去够无线电话机。

sentences.english: You will have to pay dear for that telephone.
sentences.chinese: 你得为那台电话机花很多钱。

sentences.english: May i know your telephone is inserts the fire cow or the battery?
sentences.chinese: 请问你的电话机是用电池还是插火牛呢？

sentences.english: Please dial the police station at once.
sentences.chinese: 请将电话机清理一下，包括拨号盘。

sentences.english: I bated my breath and waited by the phone.
sentences.chinese: 我屏住呼吸并等候在电话机旁。

sentences.english: Compact Desk-Top Package Fits Under A Standard Telephone Set.
sentences.chinese: 简洁的适合放置于桌面上的包装适合于标准电话机。

sentences.english: A kind of Voice Diallers for Dummies (VDD) with its principles and realizations has been introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文将介绍一种傻瓜式声控电话机的基本原理和实现。

sentences.english: He is holding the phone in his hand, shouting orders quickly.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着电话机子忙不迭地大声指挥。
